name: sparky
description: This Discord bot is designed to be an easy and customizable solution for your servers. Ideal for groups of friends, the bot offers a variety of fun and useful commands that enhance chat experience and community interaction.

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && node .
scripts.docs: typedoc --entryPointStrategy expand src --favicon assets/favicon.ico --out docs --name Sparky --readme README.md
scripts.help: echo 'Available scripts: dev, start, build, clean, format, docs'

author: Sebana02
